item.title: 🔐 No More Secrets 😎 Secure GCP Auth from GitHub Actions using Workload Identity Federation
item.description:
[TODO] - INSERT PIC

In the world of CI/CD, one thing we are all tired of is managing long-lived service account keys. They are hard to rotate.. risky to store, and can lead to serious breaches if leaked! 😿

In this post, I will be showing how to set up GitHub Actions + Google Cloud Workload Identity Federation (WIF) to enable secure, short-lived authentication — with no secrets stored anywhere. 🚫🔑
